lyrics.stanza: My only hope is the Lord; Everything depends on Him. Lord, I've loved You before, But I know that love is unstable. Set me as a seal on Your heart, Set me as a seal on Your arm. My trust is not in my holding power But in Your love and strength. In this close, sweet union, I lean on You, my Beloved. Fill my being to express You, Lord, Until You come, my Love.
